languages.text: "Так и знала, законник, пока мы десятину не трогаем, вы нас толком и не видите". {n}Женщина, довольная собой, поворачивается к вам.{/n}
"I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так и знала, законник, пока мы десятину не трогаем, вы нас толком и не видите". {n}Женщина, довольная собой, поворачивается к вам.{/n}

"I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking pleased with herself.{/n}

"I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}

languages.text: “我就知道，法务官。只要我们不碰什一税，你就会对我们视而不见。”{n}那个女人转向了你，看起来自得其乐。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我就知道，法务官。只要我们不碰什一税，你就会对我们视而不见。”{n}那个女人转向了你，看起来自得其乐。{/n}

languages.text: «Lo sabía, agente. Mientras no toquemos el diezmo, es como si fuéramos invisibles». {n}La mujer se gira otra vez hacia ti, claramente satisfecha.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo sabía, agente. Mientras no toquemos el diezmo, es como si fuéramos invisibles». {n}La mujer se gira otra vez hacia ti, claramente satisfecha.{/n}

languages.text: « Je le savais. Avec vous autres, tant qu'on touche pas à la dîme, c'est comme si on existait pas. » {n}La femme se tourne vers vous en affichant un sourire satisfait.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je le savais. Avec vous autres, tant qu'on touche pas à la dîme, c'est comme si on existait pas. » {n}La femme se tourne vers vous en affichant un sourire satisfait.{/n}

languages.text: 「法執行官、知ってるわよ。租税に手を出さなければ、あたしたちが見えないみたい」{n}その女性は自信満々の表情でこちらに向き直った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「法執行官、知ってるわよ。租税に手を出さなければ、あたしたちが見えないみたい」{n}その女性は自信満々の表情でこちらに向き直った。{/n}

languages.text: "Bilirim sizi kanuncular... Aşara dokunmadığımız sürece bizi görmezsiniz siz." {n}Kadın, büyük bir memnuniyetle sana doğru dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bilirim sizi kanuncular... Aşara dokunmadığımız sürece bizi görmezsiniz siz." {n}Kadın büyük bir memnuniyetle sana doğru dönüyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich wusste es, Gesetzeshüter – solange wir den Zehnt in Ruhe lassen, könnt Ihr uns praktisch gar nicht sehen." {n}Die Frau wendet sich wieder dir zu und macht einen überaus selbstzufriedenen Eindruck.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew it, lawman — as long as we don't touch the tithe, it's like you can't see us." {n}The woman turns back to you, looking very pleased with herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste es, Gesetzeshüter – solange wir den Zehnt in Ruhe lassen, könnt Ihr uns praktisch gar nicht sehen." {n}Die Frau wendet sich wieder dir zu und macht einen überaus selbstzufriedenen Eindruck.{/n}
